attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the monies that you are intending to spend on wind farms,would it be more conceivable that each household in the country have there own wind turbine and solar panels attached to there own property then that would reduce the amount of energy used.I know there will be disagreement from other parties,but i would rather see a wind turbine than a sky dish attached to a property.
